info.title: Medical Record System API
info.description: RESTful API for the Medical Record System application.

tags.name: Me API
tags.description: Endpoints for authenticated users to retrieve their own data.

tags.name: Sick Leave API
tags.description: Endpoints for managing sick leave records.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all visits. Restricted to ADMIN and DOCTOR roles.

parameters.name: pageable
parameters.description: Pagination information.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Optional filter for patient EGN or doctor Unique ID.

403.description: Forbidden - You do not have the necessary permissions to access this resource.

404.description: Not Found - The requested resource could not be found.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred on the server.

400.description: Bad Request - The request was malformed or contained invalid data.

401.description: Unauthorized - You must be authenticated to access this resource.

post.description: Allows an Admin or Doctor to create a new visit record.

403.description: Forbidden - You do not have the necessary permissions to access this resource.

404.description: Not Found - The requested resource could not be found.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred on the server.

400.description: Bad Request - The request was malformed or contained invalid data.

401.description: Unauthorized - You must be authenticated to access this resource.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the visit to cancel.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all patients. Restricted to ADMIN and DOCTOR roles.

parameters.name: pageable
parameters.description: Pagination information (page, size, sort)

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Optional filter for searching by patient EGN

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have ADMIN or DOCTOR role

404.description: Not Found

500.description: Internal Server Error

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of patients

post.description: Allows an Admin to create a new patient record from scratch.

requestBody.description: DTO with all patient details, including Keycloak ID.

403.description: Forbidden - Only users with ADMIN role can use this endpoint

404.description: Not Found

500.description: Internal Server Error

400.description: Invalid input - EGN or Keycloak ID might already exist

post.description: Sets the patient's last insurance payment date to the current date.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the patient whose insurance is to be updated

403.description: Forbidden

404.description: Not Found - No patient found with the given ID

500.description: Internal Server Error

post.description: Links a Keycloak user to a new patient profile in the system.

requestBody.description: DTO containing EGN and chosen General Practitioner ID.

403.description: Forbidden - Only users with PATIENT role can register a patient profile

404.description: Not Found

500.description: Internal Server Error

400.description: Invalid input - EGN might already exist or GP ID is invalid
